name: Waystone
description: A magical or mundane marker provides navigation aid and can offer additional magical benefits. The magical nature can provide protection or guidance, while the strategic placement makes it valuable for travelers and potentially vulnerable to theft or destruction.
atmosphere: Ancient stones carved with protective runes provide magical guidance and ward against dangers. Soft magical light emanates from the carved symbols while arcane energy creates a protective aura. The air hums with beneficial magic. Travelers often leave offerings at the base.
